name: Battery%Temple
description:
Instructions:

The goal of the game is to save as much battery % from each level, in order to do that you need to complete levels as quickly as possible, you also need to avoid death because each one is -5%! Each third of the battery left is counted as 30%. The game is designed to have shortcuts/multiple ways of completing the level in order to save more battery thirds.

Controls:

  1. Numpad numbers 8462 to move
  2. WASD to move( alternative)
  3. R to reset
  4. F for fullscreen

 >  A game made for the #3310jam

 > Made using Unity, Aseprite and LMMS
